content:
Hey @T-lang/WG-meta,

You may have noticed there is no meeting invite for today or next week. I'm super busy today and traveling next week so I think it's best if we skip. (Also, I've almost got last week's video ready to post; I had to do some light editing.) I wouldn't mind having an "async conversation" though about the best steps forward, though. I've been pondering what we ought to create as "deliverables" and how to best structure conversation.

(We could discuss here or perhaps on an internals thread?)
